long_description: Dress up jeans or a skirt with the elegant yet carefree prAna Glimmer T-Shirt. Lighweight recycled polyester and organic cotton fabric blend features a burnout medallion design. Organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides and offers breathable comfort and easy care. Back and front neck of the prAna Glimmer T-Shirt are framed by an intricate sublimated medallion design.
short_description: Dress up jeans or a skirt with the elegant yet carefree prAna Glimmer T-Shirt. Lighweight recycled polyester and organic cotton fabric blend features a burnout medallion design.
